title: "My mechanics are bronze but my game knowledge is diamond level."
body: You can watch streams and spew off buzz words you hear but that doesn't mean anything. If you are bronze, you do not have higher than silver level game knowledge because even gold knowledge will easily carry you into high silver. You might know very obvious things and even be able to express some advanced concepts but you clearly don't know how to apply it, which means you really don't know it.
